website_summaries.verdict: Full coverage liquid foundation that helps fight acne at the same time.
pros: Works for all skin types, even very acne prone, broken out skin
Lasts for up to 8 hours and reduces the look of redness, puffiness, and blemishes
cons: Customers with very light and pale skin tones struggled to find the right shade

customer_reviews.title: and wearing foundation to try and cover it up just made the acne worse. This product isn't at all oily and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product about a month ago. It is the first foundation I have tried that actually does it's job...cover faults and blemishes. And, you can add a light second later to the more difficult areas without flaking or discoloration. As I get older...I am 39...I have more and more problems with acne, and wearing foundation to try and cover it up just made the acne worse. This product isn't at all oily and it keeps the oil at bay all day...reducing my breakouts. And, as others have pointed out...a little does go a long way with this product. I will continue to use this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: This is the only foundation I have been using for the past 2 years. It prevents breakout and provides medium to heavy coverage. Looks fantastic if you use with a good primer. I have combination - oily skin and my face does look oily by the end of the day if I dont use a primer, but with primer it looks flawless. The color fresh neutral matches my olive skin tone perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Melodie Nye

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation!
customer_reviews.text: I have adult onset acne. This is the only foundation that doesn’t make my face break out. In fact my skin is much better since I started using it. Plus it goes on smoothly with great coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way. Like it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a while now - maybe 5 months give or take. I wrote a review when I first had it and I wasn't sure about it. Now I really like it. For me, the key is using very little and dabbing it on. I'm not sure if it's helping my acne, but it doesn't seem to be making it any worse. I'm 45 and never had an acne issue like the past year. This seems to cover up some of my redness, which makes me feel better. My sister uses it and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: I keep buying this!
customer_reviews.text: The color is perfect for my fair skin, one of the only liquid foundations that looks natural on me while still hiding my acne ridden skin. It does feel a bit heavy on though, and after a few hours I'm itching to wash it off. However, I have had the same experience with all foundations I have tried. Of all, this is the one I am happiest with.
customer_reviews.author: F.2015

customer_reviews.title: My go to
customer_reviews.text: My go to make up. I’ve been wearing this for years and it never lets me down. I sometimes break out from other make up brands but not this one. Use a beauty blender to put it on and make sure the beauty blender is damp.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: "A shoulder to lean on☺"
customer_reviews.text: So far this brand that I can trust for coverage for my oily skin. I've been trying different brand but I always go back to clinique
customer_reviews.author: JUDITH VEACH

customer_reviews.title: The color is dark
customer_reviews.text: The color is way darker than the "neutral" I order from Clinique's other products. I'll have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: stareditor

customer_reviews.title: Not the best choice!
customer_reviews.text: Not the best ! Better to use Shiseido waterproof SPF BB cream( blue one) ... This order is not like anti acne cream ! Or maybe it is expired!
customer_reviews.author: Ast

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved Clinique, and this line is great for blemishes, covers well, but doesn’t make my skin feel caked or oily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Original product. I LOVED the punctuality and the customer service from this seller. Good job
customer_reviews.author: Graciela Zwart

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and have found that this Clinique product is the only one that works for me. The color is perfect and it's easy to apply. When my skin gets dry, I add a little moisturizer to the product and that takes care of the problem. This is THE product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dogmom

customer_reviews.title: only foundation i use
customer_reviews.text: The only foundation that I will ever use. It get absorbed quickly and doesn't make my skin oily by the end of the day. Makes my skin clear up just from using it. Great coverage without feeling like I have a ton of foundation on. Very light on my face. Amazing product. Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: lalala

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation.
customer_reviews.text: It's not greasy and great for oily skin. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love this make up
customer_reviews.text: Love this make up. I have oily skin and every other brand I used either did not cover me well or I broke out with small patches of pimples through out my face. Clinique's anti blemish foundation provides excellent coverage with out looking to pancakey and causes 0 breakouts on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It stays on all day and does not give me acne. I have sensitive/fair skin.
customer_reviews.author: CB Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Controls acne and perfect match to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy lightee
customer_reviews.text: Color was way darker then what it shows was a waste of my money made me orange
customer_reviews.author: Afrady

customer_reviews.title: Better for just skin care- not as a make up
customer_reviews.text: This is the first liquid make up that hasn't broke me out. that's about the only pro. the coverage is horrible and it's cakey by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: laura mercer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but the item but not come for a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: not great for photos
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in person but for some reason doesn't look as good in photo graphs, the light hits it funny and it looks ghostly.
customer_reviews.author: anbough

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for my acne prone skin. Needs a light moisturizer underneath. My winter go to product.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Make up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. I just asked her the other day and she said it really helps control the acne. She were purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: KarenW

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for minimal appearance of makeup
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for combination skin. A thin application evens skin out, and an additional dab or two will cover up areas you are red from breaking out. It's light, quick to apply, and Amazon offers a better deal than in stores.
customer_reviews.author: CokeWins

customer_reviews.title: it’s so different between my skin and the make up
customer_reviews.text: I like the company but I don’t like you bring for me it’s so different with my skin on this make up it’s not good
customer_reviews.author: Zahra Qazizada

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend if you have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Not much coverage and it really made my skin dry. Wouldn't recommend if you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup. It helps cover my acne and doesn't create any new acne.
customer_reviews.author: Gatekeeper

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because It doesn't cause breakouts. It's oil free and it lasts well. It does a good job of covering blemishes and red areas.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out worse, is this fake product?
customer_reviews.text: works even worse than the 9 dollar neutrogena brand drug store stuff, major breakouts What a huge waste of money
customer_reviews.author: PV

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage, worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Neutrogena but switched to this. It is thick so it covers everything great without having to add extra concealer on the top. Spreads smoothly and a little goes a long way. Did not make acne worse, no greasy feel, seems to help dry the spots that are there. The shades tend to run a bit dark. I am not extremely pale but the level 2 fresh alabaster looks perfect. In summer I switch to the #3. Watch out...#4 fresh vanilla is actually quite dark despite the name. It is what I wore when I lived in Hawaii and was very tan!
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Nice coverage
customer_reviews.text: This Alabaster tone works well with my skin and doesn't show. It's not dry ...and its not oily. Will purchase again in the future. I don't have many acne issues, I just like the makeup. Does this have any UV protection though?
customer_reviews.author: Mindi

customer_reviews.title: Light base foundation
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a couple of years and it works great. I don't have breakouts like I used to if I wore regular foundation. It's light and not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Pritchett Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my wife wanted for a fraction of the "in store cost".
customer_reviews.author: Wmb

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It's not heavy and doesn't make me break out. The person I got this from got it to me quickly and was very sweet
customer_reviews.author: Talia Rose Lamanuzzi

customer_reviews.title: Love it, definitely hooked
customer_reviews.text: First time user! Full coverage and a little goes a long way. Love it, definitely hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Jennica Keyser

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect for me, really nice product and easy to use, great color. I received my product just on time.
customer_reviews.author: Yhicel J.

customer_reviews.title: I feel the number 02 is a shade of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel the number 02 is a shade of the color but there is no mention of this on the package, seems ok but the shade is off from the fresh ivory expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amenthused

customer_reviews.title: Broke me out worse
customer_reviews.text: skin got even worse when I hoped for improvement, back to the cheap drugstore stuff for me
customer_reviews.author: PV

customer_reviews.title: It didn't make my acne worse and great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I have battled with adult acne for a couple years now, and I try not to wear much make-up so to exacerbate the problem, but when I do need to wear make-up, this is my go-to foundation. Clinique does a great job of giving many shades to choose from, so I would test your shade at the store before buying on Amazon. I bought 2 bottles before I found my shade. It didn't make my acne worse so I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: BM99

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foundation I have found for my skin. I have fair, combination skin & rosacea. Every other foundation has made my skin extremely oily & didn't cover squat. This one covers very well & stays on all day!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Forrest

customer_reviews.title: The only product that works
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried this brand years ago I was suspicious that it was going to be like all the other acne-care makeup products: watery and doesn't help your acne at all. However, I found that this is the only makeup (liquid and powder) that actually does the trick. It isn't super-watery or very thick in consistency and the color (01) matches my skin-tone dead on. It's also the only makeup that has been able to keep my acne at bay. I want to make it clear that this makeup won't get rid of your acne, but it won't clog up your pours bad enough that it results in more acne than normal. Great product = 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Mulvihill

customer_reviews.title: I love Clinique Acne Solutions Liquid Makeup
customer_reviews.text: I love Clinique Acne Solutions Liquid Makeup! I have been using it for about 3 years now. I have oily acne prone skin and it covers well without encouraging future breakouts. I also have very sensitive skin and it doesn't make me itch! Even though I'm on an extremely tight budget, Clinique Foundation is one thing I will splurge on! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: High end foundation
customer_reviews.text: Not your drugstore foundation. Lovely shades and flawless finish. Great for truly all ages, for teenagers to older ladies. Does not clog pores or cause unwanted issues for most people, even me. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great Foundation
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t full coverage, but it does make my face look smoother. I like that I feel really natural with it, and it doesn’t make my face greasy or break out. I do pair it with a Clinique powder.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and well packaged. Exactly what I wanted and it kept me from having to go find a store that sells it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn & Cody

customer_reviews.title: I love this foundation!
customer_reviews.text: Before this foundation, I would usually buy cheap foundation from the grocery store makeup aisle. After I found this stuff, I tried going back and it was awful! This makeup helps calm my skin, and it goes on so much more nicely than the cheap stuff. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli K

customer_reviews.title: I got this because I have struggled with acne the ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I have struggled with acne the past few years and was hoping it would help clear me up. It didn't. I didn't get MORE breakouts than usual, but it definitely didn't help them go away. And for the price I was expecting it to. I wouldn't purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: samantha holland

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your $$$
customer_reviews.text: I received it and it was so liquidy and disappointing. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Sammy M

customer_reviews.title: YES YES YES
customer_reviews.text: Omg YES finally!!!! This makeup is so clean and the coverage is amazing!!! I didn't break out at ALL from this foundation! I will say it's a bit liquidity but the perfect primer is all it needs to shine!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! GREAT for oily complexion. Need to order a lighter color
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Leigh Summer

customer_reviews.title: and smells funny
customer_reviews.text: I don't think what's in this bottle is real Clinique, I had it for only a short time (in mild weather) and it totally separated. It's now all greasy, won't blend, and smells funny
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly, the same as what I buy in the store. which is of course, what I expect. As for the product - matches my skin tone well, applies well with fingers or brush, does not cake - natural looking. I also always find after I wear it that any blemishes or pimples recede/go away - of course, assume thta is why it is part of the "acne solutions"! :) works great!
customer_reviews.author: v_we

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like this foundation a lot. It stays on for most of the day, and it has pretty good coverage. It's almost matches my skin tone exactly. I use 01, which is the lightest shade I believe. When I don't have a tan it's a tiny bit too dark, but I'm able to blend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Seashell

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: The salicylic acid in this product dries my face out and actually causes me to break out more. Defeats the purpose of the product. Would be good for people with oily skin, but not for people with dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer101

customer_reviews.title: Love Clinique
customer_reviews.text: Clinique is always quality make up. Works great for anyone who has oily skin. I would go a shade darker than you normally would. It is a little lighter than you would anticipate.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ACNE SOLUTIONS ---- CLINIQUE FOUNDATION
customer_reviews.text: If you have oily skin and break out from it? this is best foundation you can purchase. Keeps you dry, and looking perfect for up to 12 hours. Make sure you buy your complexion shade. I have purchased this foundation many times, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: This is the best foundation, because I used many foundation from stores ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I have acne, This is the best foundation ,because I used many foundation from stores but doesn't works , this is Good coverage ,Great product and price! highly recommend this product to anyone with acne.
customer_reviews.author: karim

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive skin or do not like heavy makeups - this is perfect. Just a little bit each day seems to last for a while and I feel like it helps protect my skin as well as look great. Clinique sometimes offers free shipping and samples but buying via amazon is not much more and I get reward points.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Clinique - what can i say?
customer_reviews.text: This is the brand to keep! Not cheap, but this never disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: alice88keys

customer_reviews.title: Go to makeup for 10+ years now
customer_reviews.text: Although this line of Acne Solutions makeup is only a few years young, I've been using this product and it's predecessor since 2002. It does seem silly to expect your skin to improve by wearing makeup, but it truly does do the trick. I've always been prone to breakouts even without the make-up, which only increases once the make-up is applied. This helps mitigate the breakouts with the active salicylic acid ingredient in the make-up. I finally decided to purchase this item on Amazon versus Dillard's due to better deals. This truly depends on what type of specials are going on with Clinique when purchasing through Belk's, Dillard's, etc instead of through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage, light feel
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, not thick and gunky, but smooth and glides easily over skin yet has great coverage. Absorbs excess oil very well- Good for me in a humid climate, with oily skin, and a very active person.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer
customer_reviews.text: I've struggled with acne for 20 years and my face is clearer than it has ever been. Good quality makeup that lasts me through the day, which in turn helps keep my hands and oils from my face.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Full coverage with natural look
customer_reviews.text: This is truly worth the money. Clinique has alot of really high quality items. If you have acne and are looking for full coverage without the caked on feel n look, this is for you. Healing as well
customer_reviews.author: midwestmom76

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation. Works perfectly for my light skin tone & sensitive acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the coverage this foundation provides! It's all around just great! It doesn't come off with just a cleanser though. I have to use a cleansing brush or rag to remove all of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jemily Crocket

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic coverage and great for acne prone skin. Not oily.
customer_reviews.author: Amira

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly and was what I expeceted. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and was what I expeceted. I have been using this for a long time and it works well to cover and prevent acne.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend this for acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: I've had acne prone skin since I was 11, so I'm picky with what goes on my face. I like this product the best out of the many I've tried. It doesn't feel heavy.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the same as you get in stores. Good price. Pretty good shipping time.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Stepanek

customer_reviews.title: Love this makeup
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavier foundation that works great to hide blemishes. After using it I found I didn't break out like other heavier foundations and really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Cyber Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this product and great for those teenagers or adults suffering with acne.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Derry

customer_reviews.title: A classic :-)
customer_reviews.text: I've tried different brands before, but I always come back to Clinique! It's a great product, it feels light on my skin and blends easily.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Anthony

customer_reviews.title: I love this make-up
customer_reviews.text: I love this make-up, normally I have red/pink skin and I use this to cover it up and it does a great job covering it up.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B

customer_reviews.title: Best spot treatment
customer_reviews.text: Goes on very smoothly and covers unsightly blemishes completely. A little product goes a long way. It's nice knowing that your makeup is killing your zits while you wear it and looking beautiful :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is not full coverage but does match my freckled, slightly pink skin tone perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: jesse a page

customer_reviews.title: Very sad and disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Actually made my skin break out. Very sad and disappointed. Heavy makeup feel and skin did not breathe well. Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: This foundation allows me to wear make up and not get break-outs quite so bad. A little goes a long way too
customer_reviews.text: My 48 year old skin is confused....dry and oily at the same time. This foundation allows me to wear make up and not get break-outs quite so bad. A little goes a long way too.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Chin

customer_reviews.title: best one
customer_reviews.text: :) i liked it so much,the best one really,for my oily skin its perfect :) i advice everyone to buy it
customer_reviews.author: nino

customer_reviews.title: I love acne solutions and Clinique products
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I love acne solutions and Clinique products. I have been using the clinique acne solutions makeup for two years. I was confused why certain colors are twice as much money from some sellers? This is ok for summer, it is not the usual color that I buy. And since I do not want to pay twice as much for certain colors I ended up buying it at Macys.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my third bottle and I swear by it. I'll be getting another one in 6 months' time. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N

customer_reviews.title: More or less
customer_reviews.text: Well, you are never gonna look great with makeup on, but I liked this shade better, than all the others. More or less
customer_reviews.author: Coconut

customer_reviews.title: Too dark
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly the color I was expecting...I found it was too dark. But I do enjoy the Clinique products you offer.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis dehart

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup! I don't break out.
customer_reviews.text: I have cystic acne, so a great makeup that won't break me out is important. My only complaint is that sometimes this can look cakey if your skin dries out over the day as mine does. A little dab of lotion clears that right up!
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Always have loved this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have used this a while and love it. It helps my skin stay clear and it covers my acne scars well.
customer_reviews.author: DOT

customer_reviews.title: I was peeling after 3 days!
customer_reviews.text: Dried my face out to the point of peeling! Will not buy again due to this. Maybe better suited to those who have super oily skin and not combination like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Jovially

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to use.
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to use it. Product came in only 2 days ! Totally love it ! It is small though.
customer_reviews.author: Apolonio R.

product_meta.title: Clinique Anti-Blemish Solutions Liquid Makeup, Fresh Neutral, 1 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:Fresh Neutral| Size:1oz/30mlAnti-Blemish Solutions Liquid Makeup#03 Fresh Neutral(MF)-Dry Comb. To Oily Skin by Clinique for Women - 1 Ounce Foundation.
feature_bullets: Anti-Blemish Solutions Liquid Makeup#03 Fresh Neutral(MF)-Dry Comb. To Oily Skin was launched by the design house of Clinique
It is recommended for casual wear
